title: Why I Cannot Launch !?
body:
Why I cannot launch League Of Legends ? I click launch and then the " Launch " still there ( nothing happens ) 
Sometimes luckily, I can launch after deleting all of LoL and reinstalling. But after that day, I could launch but it still loading on the new client ... I leave it more 5 hours and it still loading when I was back. @@" Plz help me !!

replies.body:
We most often see these issues if there's a configuration on your computer or router that prevent your client from reaching the login servers. I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are in good standing.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
i tried but it can't launch in still.

In that case, one of our tech specialists will need to work with you to troubleshoot this further. I recommend running some system logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket submission.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you run into any issues.
